medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening left lower quadrant (LLQ) pain for 3 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced crampy LLQ pain worsening to significant intensity on the day of presentation, associated with diarrhea but without fever or nausea. There was no blood in stool or melena. No history or similar abdominal pain in the past.
medical_history.family_history: No bowel disease, no history of colon cancer.
